casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jerry Lee ADAMS, Jr. 80P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019

James M. Stanley, Jr., Special Deputy Attorney General, Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

Jerry Lee Adams, Jr., For Adams, Jerry Lee (Jr.)

Dear Mr. Adams:

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of March 2019 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."
